author: costin
msg: Fix bug #482 ( build fails on certain JDKs, build.compiler is wrong ).
There is no reason to force a compiler.

author: marcsaeg
msg: Fixing a couple simple documentation issues left over from time past.

author: larryi
msg: According to the spec, a servlet mapped to the url-pattern "/abc/*" should
be invoked if the URL "/abc" is used.  The prior fix allows "/abc" to fail
to match "/abc/*" when used for a security-constraint allowing it to escape
Porting the Tomcat 3.3 version of the fix that avoids this problem.
